t: PALE SAINTS – IN RIBBONS (DELUXE EXPANDED 2LP 30TH ANNIVERSARY REISSUE) (UNPIGMENTED WHITE VINYL) - LP •
s: UPC: 191400040700 Label: 4AD Format: LPRelease Date: October 6, 2023In stock items ship within 48 hours The 1990 debut album from Pale Saints, The Comforts of Madness, is an outstanding record that owed as much to post-punk and L.A.’s Paisley Underground scene than it did to shoegaze.

t: Pale Saints / The Comforts of Madness remastered & expanded reissue – SuperDeluxeEdition
s: Late ’80s British indie band Pale Saints see their 1989 debut album The Comforts of Madness expanded and reissued on CD and vinyl formats, in January. The band were very much part of the so-called ‘Shoegaze’ scene and the debut album was issued on 4AD in 1990.
